title: HAP 27 - Beyond the Reaction - The Continuing Relevance of Precolonial Traditions
itunes:title: HAP 27 - Beyond the Reaction - The Continuing Relevance of Precolonial Traditions
description: As the twentieth century draws to a close, the critique of ethnophilosophy gives way to approaches that continue to privilege the study of precolonial traditions.
content:encoded: As the twentieth century draws to a close, the critique of ethnophilosophy gives way to approaches that continue to privilege the study of precolonial traditions.
itunes:subtitle: As the twentieth century draws to a close, the critique of ethnophilosophy gives way to approaches that continue to privilege the study of precolonial traditions.
itunes:summary: As the twentieth century draws to a close, the critique of ethnophilosophy gives way to approaches that continue to privilege the study of precolonial traditions.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
